objects.specification: A large flat rectangular floor panel with a neutral light finish that brightens the room, featuring a smooth seamless surface and subtle polished texture reminiscent of high-quality laminate flooring.
A soft pastel-colored rectangular wall panel with a calm matte finish, smooth surface, and uniform tone to create a tranquil learning environment.

A large rectangular whiteboard with a smooth glossy dry-erase surface, framed by a slim metallic trim, designed for clear writing and easy cleaning.
A larger rectangular desk with a spacious flat work surface featuring a warm wood-grain finish, sturdy straight legs, and subtle beveled edges for a professional look.
An ergonomic office-style chair with a cushioned seat and backrest, smooth neutral upholstery, and a simple modern base for comfortable teaching posture.
A tall multi-tier wooden bookshelf with a warm tone finish, evenly spaced shelves filled with colorful book spines, and sturdy side panels.
A large circular wall clock with a clean white face, minimalist black hour markers and hands, and a slim polished frame.
A large rectangular window with a clear glass pane and slender frame designed to admit abundant natural light.
Soft pastel-colored fabric curtains with gentle folds and a subtle matte texture to frame the window elegantly.
